name: Bat to the Bone
description:
Game made in 7 days by a 2 person team for the AI and Games Jam 2022. The theme was "Isolation". In this game, you play as a matriarch vampire cat who has to save her brood of vampire cat babies from the evil werewolf. In order to do that, she has to keep herself isolated from the werewolf so that he cannot see her and chase her. Save as many vampire cat babies as you can before time runs out!

Since this is a submission for the AI and Games Jam, for this game, we have trained a Neural Network using Unity ML-Agents Toolkit for the behavior of the werewolves.

Team:

Diego José Alfonso Rodríguez - Game Design & 2D Art - https://diegojarblog.wordpress.com/

Laura Almón Manzano - Game Design & Programming - https://lauraalmon.wordpress.com/
